gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Heat 110, Lakers 96
gameRecap.excerpt: The Heat defeated the Lakers, 110-96. Tyler Herro (21 points, six rebounds, four assists) and Jaime Jaquez Jr. (16 points, eight assists) led eight Miami players in double-figures. Anthony Davis (29 points, 17 rebounds, six assists, five blocks) and Austin Reaves (24 points, five rebounds, eight assists) led the Lakers in the loss. The Heat move to 20-14 as the Lakers move to 17-18.
